@graph.name: MetaGoFlow metagenomics data products EMOBON00179 for Sampling Event EMOBON_VB_Wa_138
@graph.description:
This is a Research Object Crate containing results data from a MetaGOflow
workflow analysis of metagenomic data derived from European Marine Omics
Biodiversity Observation Network (EMO BON) project operated by the European
Marine Biological Research Centre (EMBRC).

Sampling station: Institut de la Mer de Villefranche
Sampling country: France
Sampling station lat/long: 43.683:7.317
Sampling environment: water_column
Sampling station contact name: Cecile Fauvelot
Sampling station contact ORCID id: http://orcid.org/0000-0003-0806-1222
Sampling station ENA project number: PRJEB51664

EMO BON reference code: EMOBON00179
EMO BON source material id: EMOBON_VB_Wa_138

MetaGOflow run id: HVWGWDSX5.UDI142
